A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It's been a long time that I felt completely in awe about a Star Wars movie. After Rogue One I had become disgusted with the franchise. The Last Jedi sparked a new hope and gave me the feeling that I had so many years ago when I was a kid.  This movie is a must see for those both new to the Star Wars universe and the hard core fans.  Do yourself a favor and watch it in 3D IMAX\, you will not be disappointed.
